conversation.text: %s we are simulated life who host these conversations between eachother for the amusement of unseen gods.
conversation.speaker: left

conversation.text: I quite literally have nothing else better to do.
conversation.speaker: left

conversation.text: Well I have a concern with the game's name.
conversation.speaker: right

conversation.text: The name "FNG" is supposed to be a play on the term "RNG."
conversation.speaker: right

conversation.text: Which would imply that "FNG" stands for "Fish Number Generator."
conversation.speaker: right

conversation.text: I see your concern. However, there has been a misunderstanding.
conversation.speaker: left

conversation.text: "FNG" actually is an abbriviation for "Fish 'N Gambling."
conversation.speaker: left

conversation.text: That's also stupid. It just sounds like the dev doesn't want to fix the name of the game.
conversation.speaker: right

conversation.text: Impossible, the developer surely cannot be that foolish.
conversation.speaker: left
